definition: variant of 新婚燕爾|新婚燕尔[xin1 hun1 yan4 er3]

sentences.english: You want the party to look similar - but not like members of a choir.
sentences.chinese: 你想讓婚宴有統一格調卻又不像唱詩班。

sentences.english: Their reception, including dinner and dancing, also was held there.
sentences.chinese: 他們的婚宴，包括宴會與舞會，也是在殯儀館舉行。

sentences.english: The centaurs were invited to Pirithous' wedding as a gesture of goodwill .
sentences.chinese: 爲了表示善意，皮裏託斯邀請人馬參加自己的婚宴。

sentences.english: The wedding banquet, remove the drinks do costs 13208 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 此次辦婚宴，除去酒水共花費13208元。

sentences.english: So remember, the décor at your Wedding and at your Reception are a really big deal.
sentences.chinese: 所以，大家可要記住了，婚禮和婚宴上的裝飾很重要。
賓客們會永遠記得婚宴上的食物。

sentences.english: Behave flawlessly at the wedding and reception.
sentences.chinese: 在婚禮和婚宴上表現的無可挑剔。

sentences.english: Jason is the fiance of small friendship, the afterward month is their to order a wedding feast.
sentences.chinese: 傑森是小雅的未婚夫，下個月就是他們的訂婚宴。

sentences.english: At the wedding reception, fearless Alice cut her wedding cake with a sword.
sentences.chinese: 婚宴上大膽的Alice用劍切開了婚禮蛋糕。

sentences.english: Best of all, you can even knit yourself into the wedding party.
sentences.chinese: 最好的就是你甚至可以把自己也編織進這個婚宴中去。

sentences.english: What will Kate and Wills' wedding feast cost a head?
sentences.chinese: 凱特和威廉王子的婚宴每個人的花費是多少呢？

sentences.english: According to the post, one guest at the wedding banquet insisted that the father-in-law should kiss the bride.
sentences.chinese: 視頻中，婚宴上的一名賓客堅持要這位公公親新娘。

sentences.english: It serves from big and medium-sized business conference to gorgeous wedding.
sentences.chinese: 從大中型的商務會議到華麗的婚宴。

sentences.english: Presents should not be taken to an engagement party.
sentences.chinese: 禮物不應帶到訂婚宴上。

sentences.english: At weddings the best man will always make a toast.
sentences.chinese: 在這個婚宴上一般是伴郎他來說祝酒詞。

sentences.english: Thousands of Miss Miriam said Liang Bing wedding, due to China to see the stars of my colleagues and feelings tears.
sentences.chinese: 千嬅表示在梁炳婚宴上，因見到華星同事而感觸落淚。

definition: to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
banquet where guests arrive at various times and are served with food as they arrive
wedding feast/liquor drunk at a wedding feast
communal meal/formal dinner of club or group
